name: Kissapeli3
description:
Kissapeli3 is a procedurally generated roguelike game with bullet hell elements.

Play as the hero Kissa and try your best to defeat the mighty Rattatata and recover your stolen cat treat. Gain fish by killing rats and buy powerful items from Duskey, the friendly but fish-addicted cat merchant.

Controls

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Mouse 1

Interact: E

Drop bait: F

Drink potion: Space

Pause menu: ESC

Show tooltip in shop: I

Development team

Rene Hilli: Project management, map design

Max Forsström: Art design, item design

Julius Huttunen: Item design, sound design, UI

Santeri Järvenpää: Lead developer, sound design

Roope Kallio: Art design, sound engineer, animator


License

This game is free to play and redistribute non-commercially.

System requirements

OS: Windows 7 (SP1+) or Windows 10

CPU: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.

Graphics API: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
